The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. leechlife.name: Leech Life
leechlife.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
leechlife.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

lovelykiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovelykiss.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
lovelykiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

transform.name: Transform
transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if it hits a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
transform.shortDesc: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubble.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzypunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

spore.name: Spore
spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
spore.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

flash.name: Flash
flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
psywave.shortDesc: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

acidarmor.name: Acid Armor
acidarmor.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes
furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

rest.name: Rest
rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

rockslide.name: Rock Slide
rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rockslide.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang
hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyperfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.
conversion.shortDesc: Changes user's type to match its first move.

triattack.name: Tri Attack
triattack.desc: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
triattack.shortDesc: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

slash.name: Slash
slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.shortDesc: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.
sketch.shortDesc: Permanently copies the last move target used.

triplekick.name: Triple Kick
triplekick.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
triplekick.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
thief.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiderweb.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
mindreader.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

snore.name: Snore
snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
snore.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

curse.name: Curse
curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
curse.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

flail.name: Flail
flail.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

conversion2.name: Conversion 2
conversion2.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
conversion2.shortDesc: Changes user's type to resist target's last move.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore
cottonspore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

spite.name: Spite
spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
spite.shortDesc: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

powdersnow.name: Powder Snow
powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

protect.name: Protect
protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

scaryface.name: Scary Face
scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

feintattack.name: Feint Attack
feintattack.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
feintattack.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweetkiss.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
sweetkiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to become confused.

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
bellydrum.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudslap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
octazooka.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon
zapcannon.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
destinybond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

detect.name: Detect
detect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
detect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

bonerush.name: Bone Rush
bonerush.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

lockon.name: Lock-On
lockon.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
lockon.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Cherry, Strawberry, or Apple type, or have the Sand Veil Ability. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
sandstorm.name: Sandstorm

gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

endure.name: Endure
endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
endure.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
swagger.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

spark.name: Spark
spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

furycutter.name: Fury Cutter
furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

steelwing.name: Steel Wing
steelwing.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

meanlook.name: Mean Look
meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
meanlook.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

attract.name: Attract
attract.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
attract.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Celebrate, Chatter, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, any two-turn move, or any Max Move.
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

present.name: Present
present.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
sacredfire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

batonpass.name: Baton Pass
batonpass.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.
batonpass.shortDesc: User switches, passing stat changes and more.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is Dynamaxed, or if the move is Assist, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, or Transform.
encore.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDesc: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
rapidspin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent
sweetscent.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 2 stages.

irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
metalclaw.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
vitalthrow.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.

morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
morningsun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

twister.name: Twister
twister.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
twister.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Chocolate-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Vanilla-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Chocolate moves.
raindance.name: Rain Dance

sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Vanilla-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Chocolate-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Vanilla moves.
sunnyday.name: Sunny Day

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crunch.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

ancientpower.name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ancientpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

rocksmash.name: Rock Smash
rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
whirlpool.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

beatup.name: Beat Up
beatup.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
beatup.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.desc: The user spends three turns locked into this move. This move targets an opponent at random on each turn. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
uproar.shortDesc: Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.
stockpile.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

spitup.name: Spit Up
spitup.desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
spitup.shortDesc: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
swallow.shortDesc: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

heatwave.name: Heat Wave
heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
hail.name: Hail

torment.name: Torment
torment.desc: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
torment.shortDesc: Target can't select the same move twice in a row.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

memento.name: Memento
memento.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
memento.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

facade.name: Facade
facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

focuspunch.name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

smellingsalts.name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
smellingsalts.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

followme.name: Follow Me
followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
followme.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

naturepower.name: Nature Power
naturepower.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
naturepower.shortDesc: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).

charge.name: Charge
charge.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled.
charge.shortDesc: +1 SpD, user's Electric move next turn 2x power.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
taunt.shortDesc: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

trick.name: Trick
trick.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
trick.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

roleplay.name: Role Play
roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.
roleplay.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

wish.name: Wish
wish.desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
wish.shortDesc: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

assist.name: Assist
assist.desc: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Bounce, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.
assist.shortDesc: Uses a random move known by a team member.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
ingrain.shortDesc: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

magiccoat.name: Magic Coat
magiccoat.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

brickbreak.name: Brick Break
brickbreak.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
brickbreak.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
yawn.shortDesc: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

knockoff.name: Knock Off
knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
knockoff.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

skillswap.name: Skill Swap
skillswap.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.
skillswap.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.desc: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
refresh.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.desc: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
snatch.shortDesc: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

secretpower.name: Secret Power
secretpower.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
secretpower.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

dive.name: Dive
dive.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

armthrust.name: Arm Thrust
armthrust.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.desc: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.
camouflage.shortDesc: Changes user's type by terrain (default Normal).

tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

lusterpurge.name: Luster Purge
lusterpurge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
lusterpurge.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

mistball.name: Mist Ball
mistball.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mistball.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

featherdance.name: Feather Dance
featherdance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

teeterdance.name: Teeter Dance
teeterdance.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

blazekick.name: Blaze Kick
blazekick.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
blazekick.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to burn.

mudsport.name: Mud Sport
mudsport.desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
mudsport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

iceball.name: Ice Ball
iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

needlearm.name: Needle Arm
needlearm.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
needlearm.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

slackoff.name: Slack Off
slackoff.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

poisonfang.name: Poison Fang
poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

crushclaw.name: Crush Claw
crushclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

blastburn.name: Blast Burn
blastburn.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon
hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

meteormash.name: Meteor Mash
meteormash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

weatherball.name: Weather Ball
weatherball.desc: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Hail, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and uses Weather Ball during Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Desolate Land, or Sunny Day, this move remains Normal type and does not double in power.
weatherball.shortDesc: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
aromatherapy.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

faketears.name: Fake Tears
faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

aircutter.name: Air Cutter
aircutter.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
aircutter.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

silverwind.name: Silver Wind
silverwind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
silverwind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

metalsound.name: Metal Sound
metalsound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
metalsound.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle
grasswhistle.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
grasswhistle.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
tickle.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.

cosmicpower.name: Cosmic Power
cosmicpower.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
cosmicpower.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

waterspout.name: Water Spout
waterspout.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
waterspout.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

signalbeam.name: Signal Beam
signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch
shadowpunch.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
shadowpunch.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
skyuppercut.shortDesc: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
sandtomb.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

sheercold.name: Sheer Cold
sheercold.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
sheercold.shortDesc: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

bulletseed.name: Bullet Seed
bulletseed.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

aerialace.name: Aerial Ace
aerialace.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
aerialace.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear
iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

irondefense.name: Iron Defense
irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

block.name: Block
block.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
block.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

howl.name: Howl
howl.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
howl.shortDesc: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.

frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

bulkup.name: Bulk Up
bulkup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
bulkup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

mudshot.name: Mud Shot
mudshot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
mudshot.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

poisontail.name: Poison Tail
poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

covet.name: Covet
covet.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
covet.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

volttackle.name: Volt Tackle
volttackle.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
volttackle.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf
magicalleaf.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
storedpower.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.
acupressure.shortDesc: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
punishment.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.desc: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split.
assurance.shortDesc: Power doubles if target was damaged this turn.

lasagnatoss.name: Lasagna Toss
lasagnatoss.desc: The user and any Pokemon hit eat their items. Berries are eaten and used up while other items completely disappear.

mitada.name: Mitada
mitada.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
mitada.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. 200 BP max

frozensong.name: Frozen Song
frozensong.desc: For 1 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
frozensong.shortDesc: For 1 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

mindjack.name: Mindjack
mindjack.desc: Fails if the target doesn't have a held item.
mindjack.shortDesc: Fails if the target doesn't have a held item.
